problem.p: You observe a satellite moving at 20,000 MPH toward the sun. Some time later, you see that the same satellite is the same distance from the sun as before, but it is now moving at 20,000 MPH away from the sun. You infer that:

choicegroup.choice: An average force was exerted on the satellite, but there was no net work done on the satellite.
There was zero average net force but non-zero work done on the satellite.
The average net force and work done on the satellite were both zero.
The average net force and work done on the satellite were both non-zero.
